function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High patient density in queue","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread and longer exposure to infected individuals","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures and queue management to reduce patient density","Technologies":"Queue management systems, floor markings, and signage","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and support staff","Owner":"Clinic management and healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"High resource utilization","Impact":"Increased likelihood of employee overutilization, burnout, and reduced satisfaction","Mitigation":"Implement optimized shift schedules, workload management, and employee support programs","Technologies":"Workload management software, employee wellness apps, and shift scheduling tools","People":"Healthcare workers and support staff","Owner":"Clinic management and healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Data collection and analysis from 10 smartphones","Impact":"Potential privacy and security risks related to patient data","Mitigation":"Ensure compliance with data protection regulations, encryption of sensitive data, and secure data transmission","Technologies":"Data encryption tools, secure data transfer protocols, and compliance management software","People":"Data analysts, healthcare workers, and patients","Owner":"Clinic management and data protection authority"}]}
